title: 196 - How To Profit From The Coming EV Boom (Matt Bohlsen)
description: Bloomberg predicts electric vehicle sales will grow 54x by the year 2040. Brian and Matt discuss how we get there and how investors can capitalize.
content:encoded: Bloomberg predicts electric vehicle sales will grow 54x by the year 2040. Brian and Matt discuss how we get there and how investors can capitalize.
